Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.16153058]SARS-CoV(Severe acute respiratory syndrome):inhibition of SARS-CoV infction in Vero cells (EC50=41.6ÂµM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry

Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: block the binding between the RBD and angiotensin-convertingenzyme 2, resulting in the inhibition of SARS-CoV entrance into host cells in vitro

Literature.Title: Screening and identification of linear B-cell epitopes and entry-blocking peptide of severe acute respiratory syndrome (SARS)-associated coronavirus using synthetic overlapping peptide library.
Literature.Author: Hu H, Li L, Kao RY, Kou B, Wang Z, Zhang L, Zhang H, Hao Z, Tsui WH, Ni A, Cui L, Fan B, Guo F, Rao S, Jiang C, Li Q, Sun M, He W, Liu G.
